name: Teddmare
description:
This version is still in developement, please report any bugs, thanks.

You are lost in the middle of nowhere and the only shelter you find is an abandoned house. You decide to go inside... After exploring the house for a bit, you notice that strange things start to happen, you are the only one, but what could it be? Books falling on the ground, blood in the bathroom?

You found a teddy inside and just when you think that something is off, you find some red glowing eyes! Wait, are theese eyes not stalking you? Maybe thats the same from the paintings? 

Help with game:

Once you find peices of message, go in the bedroom upstairs to assemble them. Note that you can only take 1 peice at a time.
